title: Upload valid PDF reports and detect financial discrepancies
description: Verify that uploading valid Compulab and SIMUS PDF reports triggers automatic data comparison and correctly identifies discrepancies including missing patients, uncoded exams, and value mismatches.

steps.description: Navigate to Financial Audit section
Upload valid Compulab PDF report
Upload valid SIMUS PDF report
System compares data automatically
System identifies missing patients
System identifies uncoded exams
System flags value discrepancies
System generates detailed Excel report capturing all detected discrepancies

title: Handle corrupted or invalid PDF report upload
description: Verify that the system gracefully handles corrupted or invalid PDF uploads in the Financial Audit module by displaying proper error messages and preventing further processing.

steps.description: Navigate to Financial Audit section
Attempt to upload corrupted or invalid PDF report
System rejects the upload
System displays informative error message about invalid PDF format
No discrepancy analysis is triggered

title: Verify completeness and accuracy of generated Excel report from Financial Audit
description: Ensure that the Excel report generated after comparison fully and accurately reflects all detected discrepancies, with correct formatting and data integrity.

steps.description: Upload matching Compulab and SIMUS reports with known discrepancies
Trigger Excel report generation
Excel file is generated and downloadable
Report contains all missing patients listed
Report lists all uncoded exams appropriately
Discrepancy values match source data
Excel formatting is clear and readable

title: Validate Westgard rule application on exam data
description: Verify that the system correctly applies Westgard quality control rules to exam metrics and flags exceptions appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to Quality Control section
Input exam metrics including mean and standard deviation
Provide test data designed to trigger various Westgard rule failures
System evaluates rules automatically
System flags exam results that violate Westgard rules
Flags include correct rule identification and description

title: Render interactive Levey-Jennings charts with correct data points
description: Ensure that Levey-Jennings charts display exam data variability accurately, are interactive, and reflect updates dynamically.

steps.description: Navigate to Quality Control section
Load exam data with historical control values
Levey-Jennings chart renders correctly with all relevant data points
Chart scales and axes are accurate
Hovering over data points shows detailed values
Modify exam data values
Chart updates in real-time reflecting the changes

title: AI Data Detective returns contextually relevant insights without hallucination
description: Test that the AI-driven assistant provides accurate, relevant, and context-appropriate responses for conversational queries about financial and quality data.

steps.description: Navigate to Data Detective assistant
Submit a variety of queries regarding financial discrepancies
AI responds with relevant answers supported by data
Submit queries related to quality control metrics and trends
AI correctly explains trends and suggests corrective actions
Responses do not contain hallucinated facts or unsupported statements

title: AI Data Detective handles ambiguous or unsupported queries gracefully
description: Verify the AI assistant's behavior when faced with queries outside its data scope or ambiguous questions, ensuring it declines or requests clarification without giving false information.

steps.description: Ask AI assistant a vague or unrelated question
AI requests clarification or politely refuses to provide an unsupported answer
Ask AI about future projections or data it cannot access
AI does not generate hallucinated facts and indicates data unavailability

title: Display and real-time update of Executive Dashboard KPIs
description: Validate that the Executive Dashboard shows up-to-date financial and quality KPIs accurately and refreshes data in real-time or on-demand.

steps.description: Navigate to Executive Dashboard
Dashboard displays all key financial metrics (e.g., discrepancy rates, revenue impact)
Dashboard displays quality control KPIs (e.g., Westgard rule violation counts)
Update underlying data by uploading new reports or exam metrics
Dashboard refreshes metrics automatically or on user request reflecting new data
Visualizations (charts, gauges) accurately represent current values

title: PDF to Excel converter preserves data integrity accurately
description: Ensure the utility tool converts a variety of laboratory PDF reports to Excel format without data loss, structural corruption, or formatting errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Utility Tools section
Upload sample PDF reports of different layouts and contents
Trigger PDF to Excel conversion
Converted Excel files are generated successfully
Excel content matches the PDF source data accurately
Data tables, numeric values, and text formatting are preserved properly

title: Platform maintenance utility performs cleanup and optimization without failures
description: Verify that platform maintenance tools execute cleanup, optimization, and other upkeep tasks safely, maintaining platform stability and data integrity.

steps.description: Access platform maintenance utilities
Initiate system cleanup operation
Maintenance operations complete successfully without errors
System performance metrics remain stable or improve
Trigger system integrity checks
No data corruption or loss is detected after maintenance

title: System stability and responsiveness under expected load
description: Test system performance and responsiveness when multiple users perform concurrent operations including report uploads, AI queries, and dashboard refreshes.

steps.description: Simulate multiple users uploading Compulab and SIMUS reports simultaneously
Simulate concurrent AI Data Detective queries on complex data
Trigger simultaneous refreshes of Executive Dashboard
System remains responsive with acceptable latency
No failures or crashes occur under load
Data correctness and accuracy maintained during concurrent operations
